title: BurpSuite 代理原理
content:
# Burp Suite 代理原理

## HTTP 代理

HTTP 正常请求

![1567259709095](/BurpSuite-代理原理\1567259709095.png)

代理Burp Suite时，Burp Suite会监听8080端口，浏览器将流量(数据)发送到8080端口，被Burp suite接受。流量会通过Burp suite，之后再由Burp suite发送到服务器。响应时，同理。

![1567259923506](/BurpSuite-代理原理\1567259923506.png)

## HTTPS 代理

HTTPS 是什么：**HTTPS = HTTP + SSL**

在Burp suite刚开始是无法抓HTTPS 的包的，需要安装一个证书。

无Burp suiteHTTPS交互过程

![1567261847238](/BurpSuite-代理原理\1567261847238.png)

有Burp Suite时，Burpsuite有两个证书，一个与浏览器通讯，一个与服务器通讯。

![1567262141388](/BurpSuite-代理原理\1567262141388.png)

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
